title: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life review
description: A revived farm sim classic finally forced me to slow down.

title: Skullgirls bombarded by negative Steam reviews after devs alter old artwork they felt was in 'poor taste'
description: The patch removes Nazi-like armbands and almost imperceptibly tones down the sexualization of some characters.

title: Diablo 4's toughest XP grind just got significantly easier
description: Nightmare Dungeons are finally worth your time.

title: Netflix Witcher promises a 'lore accurate' Geralt actor swap, and it may have to do with Ciri's dimension hopping
description: According to a producer, the Henry Cavill to Liam Hemsworth switcheroo in season four will be "flawless."

title: Minecraft movie starring Jason Momoa, by Napoleon Dynamite director, will start shooting this year
description: Pedro Pascal might be Steve? Yeah, I didn't really see this coming either.

title: Skytech Chronos 2
description: An impressive gaming machine for the price, with a couple of small caveats.

title: Diablo 4's first major patch buffs every class but is totally focused on the early game
description: Endgame builds have been largely ignored.

title: Hearthstone's Titans expansion features a brand new type of legendary card
description: Each of these gods will have three unique abilities and every class gets one.

title: Back in 2006, this tiny indie developer made a mecha game that reveres Sega's Virtual On as much as I do
description: Iron Duel is as obscure as Japanese doujin games get, but it shows what happens when a fan team dreamed big.

title: Former EA CEO talks about how AI could replace Simlish but that sounds like a horrible idea
description: Unity's John Ricitiello reckons the future is machine-authored.

title: Students added ray tracing to Descent and it looks sick
description: The 1995 shooter can now be played with pathtraced global illumination, TXAA, and more.

title: A humble RFID scanner is at the center of a fresh scandal in Formula 1's all-electric alternative

description: Don't forget the fodder or you're going to have a rough first year in Forgotten Valley.

description: Unlike other farm sims, A Wonderful Life wants you to use more than your shipping bin.

title: 6 tips I wish I knew when I started Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life
description: Start farm life right in Forgotten Valley with this guide to your first few seasons.

title: Starfield partners with AMD and oh boy, the internet is not happy
description: Some folk are mourning the perceived lack of DLSS support, some expecting more classic Bethesda launch jank, some fear Jedi: Survivor level issues, and some just straight out call for a boycott of AMD.

title: Today's Diablo 4 miracle is this player-made chart that tells you where the gear you want is most likely to drop

description: The people can't wait to get beaten up by Nora.

title: The next Guild Wars 2 expansion releases this August, and will finally answer an 18-year-old mystery
description: Secrets of the Obscure will let us explore the floating tower in the sky.

title: PC's answer to Pokemon just dropped a free version which strips out the filler and gets straight to the monster brawling
description: Temtem: Showdown gives you rewards for the base game, as long as you're on the same account.

title: Your gaming PC deserves an SSD in 2023
description: It's a good time to let the hard drive go.

title: The data suggests Britain's best years of electronics recycling are already behind it
description: But the raw numbers are hiding other trends behind Britain's plateauing recycling numbers, and an expert points to Covid and our changing attitudes to tech to provide answers.

title: I took on Corsair's new DIY iCue Link system just as any good PC builder would: with no instructions
description: The Corsair iCue Link system aims to "reignite your passion for DIY" and even though putting it together without instructions was stressful, it was worth it.

title: Court emails reveal Bethesda's confusion at Microsoft's special treatment for COD while Starfield goes Xbox-exclusive: 'What's the difference?'
description: Bethesda execs weren't clear why its owner's approach to Activision was the complete reverse of its policy for Starfield and The Elder Scrolls 6.

title: Google believes the key to beating ChatGPT is to drop its all-conquering gaming AI into the algorithm
description: Deepmind's Go AI pushed a human champion into retirement. Now Google's AI lab wants to roll it into its next-gen large language model to compete with ChatGPT. Should we be worried?
